description.narrative: This activity (Lebanon Enterprise and Employment Programme (LEEP)) is a component of Lebanon Enterprise Employment Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,484,397. This component benefits Lebanon, and works in the following sector(s): Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility, Business Policy and Administration, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-06-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility
